notes: Phase 3 - Complete Systems: Asynq job queue, WebSocket real-time updates, HLS streaming with FFmpeg transcoding, direct play with range requests, HLS.js video player, thumbnail/sprite/animated preview generation, pHash + audio fingerprinting duplicate detection, TMDB/MusicBrainz/OpenLibrary metadata scraping, performers/people, tags/genres with hierarchy, studios/labels/publishers, sort order system with drag-and-drop, full UI overhaul with media detail pages, settings, admin panel, duplicate review queue
